name: Mystical World (AndreaMejia, ArinPineda, AIID3N)
description:
That time where the gods seemed to have abandoned their faithful, three leaders of the Centaurs, Giants and Minotaurs races decided to reveal themselves to humans and take possession of the entire earth. They found that every 1000 years a representative of Olympus was born with the ability to dominate any being with his melodious voice.

After reaching the end of that day, a girl named Ariadne is born into a humble family that suffered a tragedy years ago (caused by these same beings) where only she and her older sister Alyssa were left alive. After years of planning, these beings decide to capture Ariadne to take her as a weapon and achieve total control of all the other races, but this will not be entirely easy for them because the girl is not alone and her sister will come to confront them in order to manage to rescue her.
